comment.author: Brandon
comment.text: The media claims that early voting is going in Hillary's favor because Democrats are voting in greater numbers than Republicans. I didn't know that Democrats are automatically voting for Clinton, they make it sound as if Democrats can only vote for Democrats. Out of all elections, they should know this is one where nothing is as it seems, Democrats will be voting for the Republican candidate in higher numbers than ever before.

replies.text: Share and watch. Whole Podesta election Wikileaks situation http://youtu.be/9fat63bqvG8
